abstract: The Cardinals and the Brewers don't like each other, Part 927.
snippet: The Cardinals and the Brewers don't like each other, Part 927.
lead_paragraph: MILWAUKEE - If you play in the National League Central Division for anybody except the St. Louis Cardinals, you probably can't stand the Cardinals and their manager, Tony La Russa. Lance Berkman felt that way for 12 seasons with the Houston Astros, banging heads with the Cardinals for division titles and playoff berths.
